casebody.data:
Second Department,

October, 1937.

(October 4, 1937.) The A. L. F. Realty Co., Inc., Appellant, v. Sam Goldis, Respondent; Goldson Shoe, Inc., Undertenant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division denied, with ten dollars costs. Present — Hagarty, Carswell, Davis, Adel and Taylor, JJ.
